round based deployment.

which is is the right

customizable framework

all the components

automate the life cycle
management of workload

about the connectivity,

infrastructure automation

for example, when we're at Mavenir,

power of the automation

number of employees

that's the challenge, even

So Telco Network Builder

code use cases, right?

Which is basically manage

So the the optimization

Because, at the end of of the day,

demand as an example.

Because if I need to have
